title: Introduction to CoastWatch
description: An overview of the NOAA/NESDIS CoastWatch program, it's different regional nodes, and the satellite products and services it offers.

title: Satellite 101, Part 2
description: This presentation covers EMR (electromagnetic radiation), atmospheric correction, and the differences between passive and active sensors.

title: Ocean Color
description: This presentation covers the basic principals behind ocean color satellite data and gives an overview of the suite of products generated by ocean color satellites.

title: Sea Ice
description: This presentation describes the different types of sea ice products available, and where and how to access them.

title: GitHub Software Tutorials
description: An overview of the different tutorials developed by CoastWatch for working with satellite data with R or python software.
